product_name: Columbia Sweet As II Softshell Hoodie Jacket - Men's
long_description: The men's Columbia Sweet As II Softshell Hoodie Jacket resists moisture, dries fast and features 2-way stretch panels where you need them most while hiking, climbing and scrambling. Main body is 100% polyester double weave; shoulder, underarm/sides and lower arms are made of nylon/spandex for greater stretch. Omni-Shield(R) technology resists precipitation and staining; jacket stays light in weight even if it does get wet. Articulated elbows provide a natural fit and movement. Elastic binding at hood and cuff openings feels comfortable. Zippered hand pockets; abrasion-resistant chin guard. Columbia Sweet As II Softshell Hoodie Jacket features an adjustable hem drawcord to seal warmth in and weather out.
short_description: The men's Columbia Sweet As II Softshell Hoodie Jacket resists moisture, dries fast and features 2-way stretch panels where you need them most while hiking, climbing and scrambling.
